reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Laundry Room Essential
reviews.reviewText: Having purchased the Bounce Anti Static Spray three times already, I can confidently say that this product is a staple in my home. Here's why I keep coming back to it:Exceptional Wrinkle Release: The instant wrinkle release feature of this spray is phenomenal. It saves me so much time and hassle, especially on busy mornings or when I need to quickly freshen up clothes that have been sitting in the closet.Effective Odor Elimination: Not only does it tackle wrinkles, but it also eliminates odors efficiently. This has been a lifesaver for clothes that have been stored away or need a quick refresh between washes. The spray leaves my clothes smelling fresh and clean.Static Reduction: The anti-static properties of this spray are outstanding. It's perfect for those dry winter months when static becomes a real nuisance. A quick spritz, and I no longer have to worry about clothes clinging awkwardly.Convenience and Ease of Use: The packaging is convenient, with an easy-to-use spray nozzle that disperses the product evenly. The 9.7 Fl Oz size in a pack of 2 ensures that I have a good supply on hand, making it a practical choice.Versatility: I've used this spray on a variety of fabrics, from cotton to more delicate materials, and it's always gentle yet effective. It's versatile enough to be used on bedding, curtains, and other household fabrics as well.Rapid Touch Technology: The rapid touch technology really sets this product apart. It works quickly, which is essential for those last-minute touch-ups before heading out the door.Overall Experience: Bounce Anti Static Spray, 3 in 1, has consistently proven to be a reliable and high-performing product. It's a convenient solution for wrinkle release, odor elimination, and static reduction. Given how often I've repurchased it, I can confidently recommend it to anyone seeking an effective fabric care solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goodbye static cling and wrinkles
reviews.reviewText: This stuff really works. It will dampen your clothes but it dries quickly. Fragrance is gentle, quite nice. It removes wrinkles with ease and yes, it deals a quick dispatch to static cling. Completely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well . I keep one at my workplace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for home, office, and travel
reviews.reviewText: This Bounce 3-in-1 spray does exactly what it says. I'm deep in winter now & this spray takes care of the static cling while also freshening the fabric up. That's really nice for those work cardigans that end up used off & on for months before being brought home for another wash. This Bounce spray also truly removes wrinkles. I'll hang the item on a hanger then spray Bounce on both sides before running my flat palms on both sides to reduce wrinkles. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HATE IORNING THIS IS FOR YOU THEN
reviews.reviewText: I HATE WRINKLES IN MY CLOTHES AND I DO NOT HAVE A WASHER AND DRYER AT HOME AND I HATE TO IORN. THIS IS A GIFT FROM GOD WHEN IT COMES TO WRINKLES. IF YOU HATE TO IORN LIKE ME THIS IS THE PRODUT FOR YOU. IT GETS A MAJORITY OF THE WRINKLES OUT. I HANG UP WHAT I WANT TO WEAR BEFORE MY SHOWER AND I SPRAY IT WITH BOUNCE WRINKLE SPRAY AND SHAKE IT AROUND A LITTLE ONCE I GET OUT OF THE SHOWER IT IS READY TO WEAR. BIG TIME SAVER. TIME IS MONEY THESE DAYS AND WHO WANTS TO IORN? NOT ME. I HAVE NO PATIENCE FOR IORNING. I ALSO THINK THAT I AM JINXED BY IORNS BEING THAT I HAVE HAD 3 IORNS IN MY LIFETIME FALL ON MY HEAD THAT COULD HAVE CAUSED MAJOR DAMAGE BUT THEY DIDNT. THE FIRST TIME I WAS VERY YOUNG BUT STILL REMEMBER IT. THE PAST 2 TIMES WERE RECENT WHEN I WAS STAYING IN HOTELS AFTER MY APARTMENT FLOODED AND I HAD THE SAME IORN FALL ONTO MY HEAD 2 TIMES AND THERE IS STILL A SMALL SCAR. I WOULD 100% RECCOMEND THIS PRODUCT. STOP READING GO ORDER IT YOU WILL THANK ME LATER!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: One of the two bottles came broken. The spray nozzle and function did not work. I do like the product though! Works pretty well and smells good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars happy with the results
reviews.reviewText: my main use for this is to fix static cling. i'm tired of getting shocked every time i turn around so this stuff is a blessing. i also used it just this morning to fix some wrinkles in my husband's pants before work and it worked like a charm. only downside is it smells like Off, the bug repellant. it's not a bad smell and doesn't persist but not what i'd prefer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this on subscription. I love the three in one of freshening, static remover and wrinkly remover. I use it frequently. I hate to iron and I have some jeans that come out of the dryer with the hem rolled. I spray this and smooth it and do not have to haul out the ironing board just for the hem. Smooths wrinkles, removes static and freshens - all in one.
Es super efectivo. Funciona muy bien
This product is significantly costlier in stores! It works great to remove creases from clothes and has a fresh scent.
Para un a emergencia que no tienes tiempo de planchar este producto es ideal, lo unico malo es que se humedece un rato pero seca rapido y queda la ropa sin arrugas

It’s no magic if that’s what you expect. You have to spray the garment and let it dry on its own. I actually took the easy route and used a blow dryer for faster results.I’m not impressed with how little a whole spray lasts but I like the efficiency for sure.
